Windlord::

Windlord look the base, it was slighty damaged and saw Nightlight 
fainted, she couldn't stand energon discharge. Perplex was wounded 
and he needed help.


"I'm not slave like you, Burning Hammer" yelled the hawk "But I'm not 
angry with you and I like to invite you to fight... Of course if you 
aren't afrait to loose"
